template.name: lv_mapper
template.content:
<#macro javatype nm ><#if nm ='String'>VARCHAR<#elseif nm='Long'>INTEGER<#elseif nm='Date'>TIMESTAMP<#else>${nm?upper_case}</#if></#macro> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd"> <mapper namespace="${packageName}.${moduleName}.persistence.mapper.${ClassName}Mapper"> <resultMap id="BaseResultMap" type="${packageName}.${moduleName}.common.dto.${subModuleName}.${ClassName}Dto" > <#list table.columnList as c> <result column="${c.name}" property="${c.javaFieldId}" jdbcType="<@javatype nm=c.simpleJavaType />" /> </#list> </resultMap>
<sql id="columns" > <#assign columnField><#list table.columnList as c>${c.name},</#list></#assign> ${columnField?substring(0, columnField?last_index_of(","))} </sql>
<sql id="queryCondition"> <trim prefix="WHERE" prefixOverrides="AND"> <if test="condition != null"> <#list table.columnList as c> <if test="condition.${c.javaFieldId}!=null and condition.${c.javaFieldId} != ''"> AND ${c.name} = ${"#"}{condition.${c.javaFieldId},jdbcType=<@javatype nm=c.simpleJavaType />} </if> </#list> </if> </trim> </sql>
<select id="get" resultMap="BaseResultMap"> SELECT <include refid="columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a WHERE a.id = ${"#"}{id} </select>
<select id="query" resultMap="BaseResultMap"> select distinct * from (SELECT <include refid="columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a <include refid="queryCondition"/>) t <include refid="MYSQL.pagination" /> </select>
<select id="queryNoPage" resultMap="BaseResultMap"> SELECT <include refid="columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a <include refid="queryCondition"/> </select>
<select id="count" resultType="java.lang.Integer"> SELECT COUNT(1) from (select distinct (a.id) from ${table.name} a <include refid="queryCondition"/>) t </select>
<insert id="insert"> INSERT INTO ${table.name}( <#assign insertField> <#list table.columnList as c> ${c.name}, </#list> </#assign> ${insertField?substring(0, insertField?last_index_of(","))} ) VALUES ( <#assign insertJavaField> <#list table.columnList as c> ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}, </#list> </#assign> ${insertJavaField?substring(0, insertJavaField?last_index_of(","))} ) </insert>
<select id="getById" resultMap="BaseResultMap" parameterType="java.lang.Long"> SELECT <include refid="columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a WHERE id = ${"#"}{id} </select>
<update id="updateById"> UPDATE ${table.name} <set> <#assign updateField> <#list table.columnList as c> <if test="i.${c.javaFieldId}!=null"> ${c.name} = ${"#"}{i.${c.javaFieldId},jdbcType=<@javatype nm=c.simpleJavaType />}, </if> </#list> </#assign> ${updateField?substring(0, updateField?last_index_of(","))} </if> </set> WHERE id = ${"#"}{id} </update>
<update id="delete"> <#if table.delFlagExists> UPDATE ${table.name} SET del_flag = ${"#"}{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} <#else> DELETE FROM ${table.name} </#if> <#if table.parentExists> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if table.parentTableFk == c.name> <choose> <when test="id !=null and id != ''"> WHERE id = ${"#"}{id} </when> <otherwise> WHERE ${table.parentTableFk} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} </otherwise> </choose> </#if> </#list> <#else> WHERE id = ${"#"}{id} </#if> </update>
</mapper>
